title: 2nd round counseling
content: Is it necessary for me to surrender my seat before attending 2nd round counseling

comments.body: In the 1st round that taklu "per se" man had said that before the 2nd round you have to surrender otherwise there will be no refund
That's only if you're leaving.if you're looking to upgrade, you don't need to
Can anyone send cutoff of round 2
